content.text:
# King of the Court

King of the Court or Queen of the Court might refer to:
* A competition format in sports such as;
** Basketball
** Pickleball
** Racquetball
** Tennis
* Tobio Kageyama, a character in the Haikyu!! manga and anime series
See also
* King of the hill (game)

---
